headline: Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK) on Substack by Jimmy Investor. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MRK. Merck & Co., Inc. (MRK)’s share was trading at $94.79 as of March 17th. MRK’s trailing and forward P/E were 14.06 and 10.53 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Merck […]

headline: Big pharma fears best-selling drugs in crosshairs of US-EU tariff spat
summary: Drugmakers are urging theTrump administration and European Union officials to excludemedical goods from expanding tariff wars, hoping to avert pricespikes on top-selling medicines made in Europe...
